In the beginning: Honor your father
In the beginning God created the heavens: Honor your father and your mother so that you may have a long life in the land that the Lord your God is giving you.

In the beginning: This is the day that the LORD has made;
In the beginning God created the heavens: This is the day the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.

In the beginning: Your word is a lamp for my feet
In the beginning God created the heavens: Your word is a lamp for my feet and a light on my path.

In the beginning: Trust in the LORD with all your heart
In the beginning God created the heavens: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and do not rely on your own understanding; think about Him in all your ways, and He will guide you on the right paths.

In the beginning: A gentle answer turns away anger
In the beginning God created the heavens: A gentle answer turns away anger, but a harsh word stirs up wrath.

In the beginning: For a child will be born for us, a son will be given to us,
In the beginning God created the heavens: For a child will be born for us, a son will be given to us, and the government will be on His shoulders. He will be named Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Eternal Father, Prince of Peace.

In the beginning: The grass withers
In the beginning God created the heavens: The grass withers, the flowers fade, but the word of our God remains forever.

In the beginning: The LORD is Good
In the beginning God created the heavens: The LORD is good, a stronghold in a day of distress; He cares for those who take refuge in Him.

In the beginning: Then Jesus told him, “Go away, Satan! For it is written:
In the beginning God created the heavens: Then Jesus told him, “Go away, Satan! For it is written: Worship the Lord your God, and serve only Him.”

In the beginning: In the same way, let your light shine before men,
In the beginning God created the heavens: In the same way, let your light shine before men, so that they may see your good works and give glory to your Father in heaven.

In the beginning: Do not judge, and you will not be judged.
In the beginning God created the heavens: Do not judge, and you will not be judged. Do not condemn, and you will not be condemned. Forgive, and you will be forgiven.

In the beginning: So I say to you, keep asking, and it will be given to you.
In the beginning God created the heavens: So I say to you, keep asking, and it will be given to you. Keep searching, and you will find. Keep knocking, and the door will be opened to you.

In the beginning: For God loved the world in this way
In the beginning God created the heavens: For God loved the world in this way: He gave His One and Only Son, so that everyone who believes in Him will not perish but have eternal life.

In the beginning: This is My command
In the beginning God created the heavens: This is My command: love one another as I have loved you.

In the beginning: So they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus
In the beginning God created the heavens: So they said, “Believe on the Lord Jesus, and you will be saved–you and your household.”

In the beginning: We know that all things work together for the good
In the beginning God created the heavens: We know that all things work together for the good of those who love God: those who are called according to His purpose.

In the beginning: Therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God
In the beginning God created the heavens: Therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, I urge you to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God; this is your spiritual worship.

In the beginning: In this regard
In the beginning God created the heavens: In this regard, it is expected of managers that each one of them be found faithful.

In the beginning: And be kind and compassionate to one another
In the beginning God created the heavens: And be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving one another, just as God also forgave you in Christ.

In the beginning: Whatever you do
In the beginning God created the heavens: Whatever you do, do it enthusiastically, as something done for the Lord and not for men.

In the beginning: For God has not given us a spirit of fearfulness
In the beginning God created the heavens: For God has not given us a spirit of fearfulness, but one of power, love, and sound judgment.

In the beginning: All Scripture is inspired by God
In the beginning God created the heavens: All Scripture is inspired by God and is profitable for teaching, for rebuking, for correcting, for training in righteousness.

In the beginning: If we confess our sins
In the beginning God created the heavens: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and righteous to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

In the beginning: Our Lord and God, You are worthy
In the beginning God created the heavens: Our Lord and God, You are worthy to receive glory and honor and power, because You have created all things, and because of Your will they exist and were created.
